articles.title: Earth’s Invisible Shield Rebounds: The Remarkable 2024 Ozone Recovery - SciTechDaily
articles.description: In 2024, the ozone hole over the Antarctic showed a notable reduction in size, ranking as the seventh smallest since monitoring began post-Montreal Protocol. This improvement is credited to ongoing reductions in CFC emissions and enhanced atmospheric dynamics…
